articles.content: Journey’s Neal Schon and Jonathan Cain have resolved their legal dispute with former bassist Ross Valory and former drummer Steve Smith, putting to rest a yearlong battle that included lawsuits from … [+1796 chars]

articles.title: MSCHF ordered to halt fulfillment for 'Satan Shoes' in Nike lawsuit - NBC News
articles.description: Nike filed for a temporary restraining order Tuesday, asking the court to keep MSCHF from issuing orders, using any Nike work and referring to Nike's logos.
articles.content:
A judge has ruled that MSCHF must stop fulfilling orders for its "Satan Shoes" in a trademark infringement lawsuit brought by Nike.

articles.title: Paul Simon, 79, becomes latest rocker to sell his entire catalogue in deal with Sony - Daily Mail
